srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_external_attr odf_ca_int_external_attr, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_external_objects.id odf_pk, im_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, im_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_external_objects.im_id as im_id, im_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, im_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_external_objects int_external_objects, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_integrationmappings.id odf_pk, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, and int_external_objects.im_id = im_id.odf_pk) external_object_id where 1 = 1 and int_external_attributes.external_object_id = int_external_objects.id and int_external_attributes.created_by =
